00023 #ifndef _ODE_ROTATION_H_

00027 #include <ode/compatibility.h>
00028 
00029 #ifdef __cplusplus
00030 extern "C" {
00031 #endif
00032 
00033 
00034 void dRSetIdentity (dMatrix3 R);
00035 
00036 void dRFromAxisAndAngle (dMatrix3 R, dReal ax, dReal ay, dReal az,
00037              dReal angle);
00038 
00039 void dRFromEulerAngles (dMatrix3 R, dReal phi, dReal theta, dReal psi);
00040 
00041 void dRFrom2Axes (dMatrix3 R, dReal ax, dReal ay, dReal az,
00042           dReal bx, dReal by, dReal bz);
00043 
00044 void dRFromZAxis (dMatrix3 R, dReal ax, dReal ay, dReal az);
00045 
00046 void dQSetIdentity (dQuaternion q);
00047 
00048 void dQFromAxisAndAngle (dQuaternion q, dReal ax, dReal ay, dReal az,
00049              dReal angle);
00050 
00051 /* quaternion multiplication, analogous to the matrix multiplication routines. */
00052 /* qa = rotate by qc, then qb */
00053 void dQMultiply0 (dQuaternion qa, const dQuaternion qb, const dQuaternion qc);
00054 /* qa = rotate by qc, then by inverse of qb */
00055 void dQMultiply1 (dQuaternion qa, const dQuaternion qb, const dQuaternion qc);
00056 /* qa = rotate by inverse of qc, then by qb */
00057 void dQMultiply2 (dQuaternion qa, const dQuaternion qb, const dQuaternion qc);
00058 /* qa = rotate by inverse of qc, then by inverse of qb */
00059 void dQMultiply3 (dQuaternion qa, const dQuaternion qb, const dQuaternion qc);
00060 
00061 void dRfromQ (dMatrix3 R, const dQuaternion q);
00062 void dQfromR (dQuaternion q, const dMatrix3 R);
00063 void dDQfromW (dReal dq[4], const dVector3 w, const dQuaternion q);
00064 
00065 
00066 #ifdef __cplusplus
00067 }
00068 #endif
